description: The classic flannel just moved up a weight class. With a structured cotton twill weave, the Tamaro Overshirt works just as well as a casual fall jacket as it does a toasty midlayer. Combining soft organic cotton with a hint of elastane for added stretch, this timeless outdoor staple is rounded off with two chest pockets and adjustable cuffs. The perfect choice for relaxed days in the great outdoors.
name: Mammut Tamaro Overshirt - Mens
